meanings.definition: The quality or state of being talkative.
meanings.sent1: Her talkativenesses made her the life of the party.
meanings.sent2: His constant talkativenesses often annoyed his coworkers.
meanings.sent3: The talkativenesses of the parrot entertained the guests at the zoo.
meanings.sent4: The talkativenesses of the stream filled the forest with chatter.
meanings.sent5: The talkativenesses of the radio host kept listeners engaged for hours.

meanings.sent1: The teacher's talkativenesses in class sometimes disrupted the lesson.
meanings.sent2: Her talkativenesses during meetings often led to important points being missed.
meanings.sent3: The talkativenesses of the clock in the silent room seemed almost deafening.
meanings.sent4: The talkativenesses of the wind whispered secrets through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The talkativenesses of the old typewriter filled the room with nostalgic clatter.
